title: Simple KDP Niche Research Method NO ONE Talks About

tactics.name: Amazon BSR Scanning
tactics.description: Use Amazon bestseller lists to identify low-content niches by scanning categories and subcategories for standout books.
steps: Visit Amazon's bestseller lists (e.g., new releases, movers and shakers).
Scroll through pages to spot low-content books like workbooks or coloring books.
Open promising titles in new tabs for deeper analysis.
caveats: Requires significant time investment to scan all categories
source_quotes: If you spend a good few hours doing this... you're going to find niches you never thought about.

tactics.name: bestseller_subcategory_analysis
tactics.description: Identify niches by analyzing Amazon bestseller lists and subcategories
steps: Search for keywords in bestseller lists
Filter keywords with high search volume and demand
caveats: Seasonal niches may have timing constraints
source_quotes: reverse coloring book if we take this then go to all plug that in

heuristics.name: Low Review Filter
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are less than 200, prioritize the niche
source_quotes: Gift ideas... is normally a gold mine when it comes to finding niches.

heuristics.name: low_review_niche_boost
source_quotes: demand looks okay an opportunity looks good as well

claims.statement: KDP niche research can uncover underserved markets by analyzing Amazon's bestseller lists across all categories and subcategories.
source_quotes: If you start doing this on every single category... you're going to find some really great niches.

claims.statement: KDP niches can be discovered through systematic bestseller list analysis
source_quotes: come through give it a go I am going to leave a link

niche_patterns.description: Targets specific audience segments with unique activity preferences and limitations.
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines broad appeal with niche specificity to create low-content, high-demand opportunities.
source_quotes: We have blank comic book for kids... estimated 3,700 search volume.

niche_patterns.example: halloween-themed products + niche audience + seasonal constraint
niche_patterns.description: Combine specific product types with targeted audiences and temporal limitations
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Creates urgency and specificity for niche markets
source_quotes: this is a really good idea and look at the that it's had over the last 30 days
